EmailTemplate.description: VIN presents in CARFAX PowerUP 2012 Series
EmailTemplate.name: CARFAX PowerUP 2012
EmailTemplate.subject: CARFAX PowerUP Webinar features VIN - Register Today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Register today for this FREE 45-minute session to discover the next generation of marketing: Using data to drive sales. Sean Stapleton and Kendall Billman, VinSolutions, will show dealers how to find valuable insight using information about their customers.
To help you hold gross, Mike Platts, CarFax, will reveal how to integrate vehicle history throughout your sales process.
Join us and find out:
How to target customers with behavioral data Proven vs. Guess statistic analysis - what works Best ways to integrate technology with your dealership
May 25th at Noon EST. FREE. Space is limited!
Register at: https://carfax.webex.com/carfax/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=759199484
